name: Mort's Dream Jump (Early Technical Demo)
description:
Mort's Dream Jump is a powerup platformer from the creator of the LOVE series. Control Mort as you run and jump your way through short stages, collecting stars and powerup as you go.

This very early technical demo with tons of very placeholder assets contains nine levels with a variety of movement based powerups to aid you. 

If you've had fun with it, come hang out in the Mokuzai Studio Discord and share your thoughts as well as your run results!

Development on this game started on January 28th 2023 and will hopefully finish before the end of the year. There's very obviously a lot to do, but I'm excited to share the current state of the game and get impressions and feedback from early players.

Notes: There's currently no music, but I'll be working with the brilliant James Bennett. For now, please listen to the LOVE 3 soundtrack on repeat while you play.
